comments.body: At some point I'd like to move scalarmath back into multiarray. The idea would be to put all needed functions in `npymath`. I think there are only a few ufuncs still needed.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +115,119 @@     * approx 10us overhead for stack size of 10
     *
     * TODO some calls go over scalarmath in umath but we cannot get the base
     * address of it from multiarraymodule as it is not linked against it
     */

comments.body: Is there a private internal header this can go into? (can be in a later PR)

I thought about that. There didn't seem to be a good place in `numpy/core/include/numpy` or in `numpy/core/src/private`, and `numpy/core/src/multiarray/common.h` didn't seem quite right either. If we want to go that route I think maybe a new `numpy/core/src/private/npy_macros.h` or some such might be the best way to go.
